course_title: Special Topics in Physics: 50 Years Theoretical Biophysic
class_notes: (Complete Topic: 50 Years of Big Ideas in Theoretical Biophysics)
course_description: Offered as required. Credit, two to four hours. Prerequisite: consent of instructor.Selected topics and problems of special or current interest in physics. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
